name: Her Last Day
description:
In this game, you have to help Granny to survive as long as possible by procrastinating stuff she should be doing. Death can wait.

Status: To be honest, the game is far from finished. The lighting doesn't look nice in the WebGL version yet, so rather play the downloadable Windows version if you can. :)

Credits Development

Her Last Day was created by Hexenwerk and tirbelain for Ludum Dare 50 in April 2022.

Music
